name: Isaiah Lopez
text: Love it up at this place. Always when I walk in there is always a fresh pizza rolling out of the oven into my plate.  Always hot and fresh

name: Wesley R
text: The service here is hit-and-miss. I was calling in an order and they asked me to hold and never came back for 30 minutes. I eventually just drove down there and tell them about it and all she could say was sorry about that and that's all. …More

name: K Jammz
text: When your in a pinch for funds, not a bad place to grab a couple of pizzas.

name: Rosy Naameh
text: I always find what I'm looking for at Kmart. They have good prices and a really good rewards program.

name: Lindzer 365
text: Customer service was horrible when my husband and I went. The place to sit was really dirty, they had no large lids, kept asking them to bring out more but ignored me. The only up side is that your pizza is always fresh. Please take some time and clean your dining area!!

name: leon green
text: Almost always has are Pizza ready by the time we go to pick it up. $7.99 for a large 3 topping is a great price

name: Maria Parra
text: The pizza was awesome staff is friendly and very very helpful I come here all the time

name: Cathy Mergerson
text: I think little caesars is the greatest pizza restaurant in America my grand kids will only eat little caesars pizza any other pizza they pick over it and complain about that it doesn't taste like little caesars. My grandson is 16 years old …More

name: Kung Fu San Soo
text:
Pretty quick service for a snack.Tasted ok.
Didn't do dinner so we shared a hot pie.

name: Nancy Galvez
text: This place is disgusting, too bad I had to give it one star in order to review . My husband stop by after work to pick up two hot and ready, which they did not have made so he decided to do 2 most bestest since they had to make them …More

name: Arlene Vasquez
text: If i could give them 0 stars i would! Customer service is absolutely horrible!!! Customer service is usually not very great but the pizza has always been fresh and i mainly liked coming to this location because of the specials they use to …More

name: Phillip McCary III
text: I Love there $5 Lunch special!

name: Rich izboss
text: Fast service. Staff goes above and beyond

name: Richard Prelesnik
text: Closed way before 8, pizza can be good but they always use very little sauce.

name: Sybil Delahoussaye
text: Great to feed a lot of people, for a low price.

name: Silverhead 3962
text: Best pizza in this Kmart...so fresh, was awesome

name: Christine Bujanda
text: Love the supreme!  Super delicious!

name: Mr Matt2d2
text: Fast service good food

name: Domingo Canizales
text: Good pizza but most times the wait is crazy

name: jeffrub80
text: These employees are the rudest people that I have ever met. I’ve tried to go back a couple of times hoping thy were just having a bad day... oh no they are still a POS! Never returning to this location

name: Martin Schneider
text: Fast cheap pizza

name: Mariana Garcia
text: Out of all pizza places I think little Cesar pizza is the least greasy

name: Stan Snow I
text: Great needed a bunch of lunch specials and she had them all ready for me. Even though they didn't open until 11am I didnt get her name but she ROCKS a credit to get company..opener on friday

name: Sergio Acevedo
text: I call for order and wait long time for answer...and finally they pick my order ...when pick-up my 2 pizzas and 2 hot wings the pizzas was horrible burned and folded one side....share if you have any bad experience.. Atte. Customer

name: Suzanne Phelps
text: This is not a fast and ready little Ceasars. A 10 min wait turned in to a 35 min wait for one cheese pizza and some bread sticks. Maybe because it's inside a Kmart. I suggest order then go shopping your order may be ready by the time you're done.

name: Alex Merk
text: AS OF 11/14/2018 THIS LOCATION HAS BEEN SHUT DOWN AND ITS SAYING THEYRE STILL OPEN

name: Lessete Ayala
text: Favorite Little Ceasars is at this Kmart!! Pizza here is soooo delicious!

name: Chris Tian
text:
They take for ever
Only 3 ppl ahead of me and took me 20 minutes to get my pizza
But pizza was good
They close too early tho

name: Juan Carrillo
text: cashier completely bored out of his mind, unprofessional, sure it's a little ceaesar's spot but don't act like that. 20 minute wait for one pizza.

name: Jake K
text: Its inside Kmart FYI. Hot and readys are not ready. Defeats point if you have to wait 10 min.

name: Yuri Rangel
